front.title: Recommendation on Stable IPv6 Interface Identifiers

abstract.t: This document changes the default Interface Identifier generation scheme for SLAAC to that specified in RFC7217, and recommends against embedding link-layer addresses in IPv6 Interface Identifiers. It formally updates RFC2464, RFC2467, RFC2470, RFC2491, RFC2492, RFC2497, RFC2590, RFC3146, RFC3572, RFC4291, RFC4338, RFC4391, RFC5072, and RFC5121, by removing the text in these RFCs that required the IPv6 Interface Identifiers to be derived from the underlying link-layer address, and replacing the aforementioned text with a pointer to this document. Additionally, this document updates RFC3315 by specifying additional requirements on the generation of Interface Identifiers used in Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol version 6 (DHCPv6). It also provides advice to system administrators who employ manual configuration.
